container-instances
*******************


Description
===========

A description of the Container Instance CLI


Available Commands
==================

* container

  * get

  * list

  * retrieve-logs

  * update

* container-instance

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * list-shapes

  * restart

  * start

  * stop

  * update

* work-request

  * get

  * list

  * list-errors

  * list-logs
